dotnetType.name: FixedSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FixedSchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new fixed-length bytes serializer builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FixedSchema" />; an unsuccessful
            result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds a fixed-length bytes serializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated serializers should use for write operations.

Generates a conversion from the source type to the intermediate type. This override
            will convert a <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> value to a byte array prior to applying the base
            implementation.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FixedSerializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilderCase
